messages.subject: Music
messages.msgSnippet: Alright, since Yahoo accepted that last post, let me post what I wanted to say again. With regards to Chapter 9, it s best appreciated if read while listening
messages.messageBody:
Alright, since Yahoo accepted that last post, let me post what I
wanted to say again.

With regards to Chapter 9, it's best appreciated if read while
listening to Evanescence's "Whisper" or "Tourniquet", particularly
during the battle scene at the Ikeda-ya.

Thanks. I hope this post makes it...

--M.
